comments_since_last_sample.body: Does your recipes always taste good 🤔🤔
Maybe it’s just me. But a lot of these drinks look nasty. To many drinks mixed. They look cool but it’s to many flavors mixed for me. I already don’t drink. So these concoctions look like death

Robin:" What have you done Slade?!"
Slade:" Hello Robin, I have made Slade fortys. The 40 0z bottle looks like my mask so half the bottle isn't getting any light, just turn the orange side into the shelf and boom... 40s that get 50% less sun exposure."
The Bong Water really messed him up it seems.

Normally when people comment "you will get blind from this", you wont, but like this, actually wtf. Even if you let that sit for a long time, like 24 hours, the everclear makes everything so goddamn high percentage, that you actually wouldnt want to survive this. Like at one cup you'll be like let me firetrucking die already. Dont make this. Please.
what happened to your voice,have you ate dry ice?
